author: Perez Hilton
title: Donald Trump Is Mad Online
text:
Hey Donald, you mad, bro? 
It appears Donald Trump is still FUMING over how a Federal judge blocked his unconstitutional Muslim ban immigration executive order last night, and because of it, the President's angry tweets are lasting well into the afternoon! 
Related: Eminem Just Brutalized The Donald With Hot Fire! 
Here's the tweet where Trump is (a) absolutely mad online, and (b) definitely, completely missing the boat in understanding the checks and balances system and constitutional authority: 
What is our country coming to when a judge can halt a Homeland Security travel ban and anyone, even with bad intentions, can come into U.S.? — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 4, 2017 
And here's a little more from The Donald (below): 
Because the ban was lifted by a judge, many very bad and dangerous people may be pouring into our country. A terrible decision — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 4, 2017 
Seriously — Donald, you mad, bro?? 
But more serious — how dictator-ish does THAT tweet look? 
Related: News Stations Are Pulling Out Of #NerdProm Due To Trump 
The courts have temporarily halted his immigration ban because a federal judge ruled it is unconstitutional. 
In America , checks and balances make it so that this immigration ban can go through the court system and qualified people can decide whether it is actually legal or not. 
Is that not how they do things in Russia , Donald? 
Scary to imagine just how quickly The Donald would love to dismantle the American court system if he could. 
#Dictator
